lyrics:
50 contributorstranslationsespañolpop out lyricspart i

verse 1 lil baby
under thirty made the forbes list im a walking script record me

you can follow baby wont lead you wrong bro i aint gon never fail you
big was tryna show me the right way to go i was so rebellious
whatever they doin dont bother me bro im oh so careless
you the type of guy that want the i for rеal you all so selfish
im the type of guy rеady to die for this shit if it gon prevail us

cuban links on just because this shit really from the mud

part ii

pop up with them switches on
pop up with that shit on
pop up like my granny grandma granny lot of chains on

she said wick you made me sick how when im your medicine
aint gay dont go that way at all but i love that nigga benjamin
chop stick grrtbahbahbahbah keep that for the robber men
foreign fabric cars and hoes im the only thing american

how we got the same cars they drove in fast and furious

coldhearted touch my chest and you gon burr
you might also likeverse 3 lil baby
super fast i hit the gas you hear her skrrrr

i was standin on the block tryna get a rack to buy a buick
now im trim lamborghini boy i know you seen that urus

put piranhas on yo ass three four hundred on your ass
get the switch she actin bad like your mama on your ass

i done manifested this shit as soon as i see it im gonna grab it
i act humble but you can go and check my numbers i aint average
